short_summary: REQUEST FOR INFORMATION (RFI) AND EXPRESSION OF INTEREST (EOI)
description: This RFI/EOI process is a formal means by which the Industry may provide information to the CMHC, and the tender closing date is 2023-10-25
full_summary:
**REQUEST FOR INFORMATION (RFI) AND EXPRESSION OF INTEREST (EOI) FOR EMPLOYEE RECOGNITION PROGRAM**

**Reference Number**: cb-9018-40690935
**Solicitation Number**: RFI-002148
**Publication Date**: September 14, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: October 25, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

The Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation (CMHC) is seeking information from the industry through a Request for Information (RFI) and Expression of Interest (EOI) to identify potential vendors for the provision of an employee recognition program through an integrated platform. The program will be delivered through a technology solution that connects to CMHC’s systems via single-sign-on (SSO).

The purpose of this RFI process is to gather information and input from the industry on their capabilities to provide a customizable employee recognition program. This process represents an opportunity for CMHC to learn about the various employee recognition solutions available in the market and to identify potential vendors who can meet its requirements.

**Key Requirements**:

* The employee recognition program must be delivered through a technology solution that connects to CMHC’s systems via SSO.
* The program must be customizable to meet CMHC’s specific needs.

**Trade Agreements**:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

**Regions of Opportunity**:

* Canada

**Contact Information**:

* Daniela C. Michaud, Contracting Officer
* Email: [dcmichau@cmhc-schl.gc.ca](mailto:dcmichau@cmhc-schl.gc.ca)
* Phone: 613-740-4203

**Attachments**:

* RFI Document (English): [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/9018/rfi-002148-employee-recognition-program_en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/9018/rfi-002148-employee-recognition-program_en.pdf)
* RFI Document (French): [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/9018/rfi-002148-employee-recognition-program_fr_0.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/9018/rfi-002148-employee-recognition-program_fr_0.pdf
